backend/main.mo: Defines authorization-backed actor for managing user profiles and service requests, including status tracking, notes, and request creation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing logo-generation requirements and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptions used for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring favicon, Apple touch icons, Open Graph metadata, and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, layout, theming, notifications, and admin route protection.
frontend/src/components/admin/NotesPanel: Shows public and internal notes for a request and allows adding new notes with tabs.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with login prompt and link back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loaders or denial as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout actions and displays button states based on authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to create a profile and submits name and email.
frontend/src/components/BrandCard.tsx: Styled card wrapper component with rounded border and shadow.
frontend/src/components/FormField.tsx: Reusable labeled form field wrapper supporting errors and helper text.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Pricing section displaying categorized services with prices using BrandCard layout.
frontend/src/components/RequestStatusTim: Timeline component displaying request status history with icons, timestamps, and current status highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Renders grouped service checkboxes and updates selected services via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays footer sections with links, service lists, and dynamic year and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides site navigation with login, admin links, mobile menu, and pricing scroll handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSideReferenc: Manages client-side reference images with add, remove, and clear operations using object URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, and clearing identities. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom defaults and exposes login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for creating, fetching, and updating service requests via the actor backend. Includes mutations for status updates, notes, and request creation with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles. Applies background, text, and border utilities globally.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports app branding constants including name, subtitle, and full title.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Contains a static service catalog with pricing and helpers to filter services, format prices, and calculate totals. Supports repairs, customization, and performance categories.
frontend/src/lib/statusUtils.ts: Maps backend request statuses to human-readable labels and UI variants. Used for consistent status display in the UI.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge to merge class names cleanly.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestDet: Admin detail view for a single request with status updates, price editing, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestsPa: Admin list of all service requests with filtering by status and navigation to request details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page displaying hero content, services preview, and navigation actions. Handles hash-based scrolling for the pricing section on load.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestConfirm: Confirmation page showing submitted service request ID and navigation options to track status or return home.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestPage.ts: Form page for submitting a new service request, handling validation, image uploads, service selection, and request creation.
frontend/src/pages/StatusLookupPage.tsx: Lets users enter a request ID to fetch and display service request status and details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state for deploying and integrating generated logo assets, noting missing uploaded logo and listing pending feature requests for applying the assets across the UI and HTML head.
